definitions: A movable joint or mechanism on which a door, gate, or lid swings open and shut or which connects two parts so that one can turn on the other.
A natural bodily joint, such as the knee, that allows movement in one plane.
A small, gummed paper rectangle used to attach a stamp to an album page.
examples: The door swung on its hinges.
The hinge joint of the knee.
He carefully mounted the stamp with a hinge.
